thread.title: Model’s blackmail attempt goes horribly wrong
thread.title_full: Model’s blackmail attempt goes horribly wrong

title: Model’s blackmail attempt goes horribly wrong
text:
Email a friend 
A MODEL took a selfie with ice hockey star Jaromir Jagr sleeping soundly in the bed next to her. It was innocent enough until she allegedly tried to use the picture to blackmail the 43-year-old Czech player, who it turned out didn’t care. 
The Mirror reportsmodel Katerina Provaznikova, 18, tried to extort $2000 from Jagr but the former NY Rangers star doesn’t have a girlfriend and told her to do with the photograph what she pleased. 
The after-sex selfie was a fail for Provaznikova and fodder for those with the time and creativity to mock the young model online. Katerina Provaznikova took this photograph with Jaromir Jagr and reportedly failed in an attempt at blackmail. Source: Twitter 
A series of photographs posted to Twitter, Facebook and Instagram tagged #JagrSelfie and #TeamJagr show women — and even a few men — in bed with an unsuspecting second party being photographed in bed behind them. 
One shows a woman with a dog, another shows a woman with a lizard and a third shows a woman in bed with a picture of Jagr resting on the pillow behind her. A photo posted by @ondrsim on Sep 19, 2015 at 4:23am PDT A photo posted by Lubič Salátovič (@lusalat) on Sep 18, 2015 at 11:34pm PDT A photo posted by Gabriela Skálová (@gabimocuishle) on Sep 18, 2015 at 4:27am PDT A photo posted by Milan Polak (@milanpolak) on Sep 19, 2015 at 1:28am PDT A photo posted by EvaMarti (@evamarti_) on Sep 22, 2015 at 7:55am PDT A photo posted by Duběnka (@panidubova) on Sep 19, 2015 at 8:55am PDT A photo posted by Michaela Cichrová (@cichrovamichaela) on Sep 18, 2015 at 2:18am PDT 
Well done, internet.
